Q2 2015. The population in districts with at least one populated center covered by 3G are considered as covered.

From 2016, the Osiptel coverage regulation is followed: a district has coverage of the service when the capital of the district and at least 45% of the other populated centers located inside of the district are covered.

From 2017, the Osiptel coverage regulation is followed: a district has coverage of the service when the capital of the district and at least 60% of the other populated centers located inside of the district are covered.
